ColorMapping: How to map calculated curvature values to colors
ColorRangeMultiplier: Multiplier for how the curvature values fill the available range in the selected Color Mapping; a larger value means that higher curvature is required to achieve the maximum color value.
MinRangeMultiplier: Minimum for the curvature values to not be clamped to zero relative to the curvature for the maximum color value; a larger value means that higher curvature is required to not be considered as no curvature.
Clamping: Clamping applied to curvature values before color mapping
